New films and DVDs for April 2016

Star wars episode VII – The force awakens

Seventh instalment in the series, set 30 years after Return of the Jedi. The Force Awakens brings together original characters such as Han Solo (Harrison Ford) and Princess Leia (Carrie Fisher), and new characters scavenger Rey (Daisy Ridley), former stormtrooper Finn (John Boyega) and X-wing pilot Poe Dameron (Oscar Isaac).

Joy

Based on the life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano (played by Jennifer Lawrence), Joy invents a self-wringing mop despite personal and professional obstacles.

Sisters

Comedy starring Amy Poehler and Tina Fey. Two sisters hold a party for their former classmates at their parent’s house.

In the heart of the sea

Ron Howard directs this action adventure recounting the events that inspired Moby Dick. A whale destroys a ship in 1820 as the crew struggle to survive.

Krampus

Christmas horror film about a family tormented by the folklore-inspired demon Krampus.

Victor Frankenstein

Daniel Radcliffe and James McAvoy star as medical student Victor Von Frankenstein and his protégé Igor Strausman.
